game_description: ' Fear Dead House ' is a game to explore paranormal activities. Open each possible door of a horror house and experience thrilling, scary paranormal activities. Supports 90Hz/120Hz on Quest 2 In the house of mystery, you will find and fall into the trap of ghosts. Flying chairs, scary zombies, crying doll, horror tv, dead bodies of the ghost, a flying skeleton who might attack you. You will have a torch to carry and explore in the dark death house. Face your fear to explore the whole dead house.
Languages: English, English (Australia), English (UK), English (US), English (Canada), English (South Africa), French (Belgium), French (Canada), French (France), German, German (Switzerland), Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela), Swiss German
review_1: So I bought this game for party’s so I could dare people to try it and it gave me exactly what I wanted. The graphics were really good, and the games scary. It is not a game to consistently play but if you or you want somebody to get a quick scare, it’s a great game.
review_2: I started exploring the dark house and opened each door, some effects are really scary and some are ok. Totally worth buying and give a try. I read the review on sidequest and tried this.
